name: College Days
description:
Your final year was supposed to be an easy time, studying and preparing for the end of year finals. But when your best friend involves you in a crazy experiment your life is turned upside down, unexpected consequences ensue leading to a chaotic final year.Features
  • A cute and fun, well written storyline.
  • Multiple routes and choices that affect the endings.
  • High quality characters, backgrounds and CG Scenes.
  • 1080p window & full screen options.
  • Multiple save slots and full VN functions.
